note: Since early‭ ‬2011,‭ ‬I have filled my little car with my cajon,‭ ‬resonator,‭ ‬acoustic guitar,‭ ‬harmonica,‭ ‬mandolin,‭ ‬and capos,‭ (‬and a bed‭) ‬and journeyed to find people and places I can lay all my heartfelt songs before like a contemporary troubadour.‭ ‬I’m not trying to show off my music,‭ ‬rather use it as a way to connect.‭ ‬It’s about response,‭ ‬not payment.‭ ‬It’s about being moved,‭ ‬rather than entertained.
